name: Delight Boulder Dash 1
overview: Another treat from the Belgian bombshell, called No One, for your spelunking delight. A set of 20 caves using the PLCK Boulder Dash engine created by different makers and compiled by No One with a special twist which allowed a surprise effect: Every time you play, the caves are different. Over a million different variations of play!! Originally published in 1987 and then updated and re-released in late 1988. The game was originally released in 2 parts, but eventually at least 24 were part of the Delight series.
